overview: Teresa is a house sitter with a long list of references. Kevin Kline is a thief with a long rap sheet. Their lives collide when Kline begins on an unrelenting journey to gain entry to the house and take something that belongs to him. He watches her every move with calculated precision, planning, plotting… Will he succeed in his sinister plan? Or will Teresa protect her pristine reputation and prevent the robbery? Only the house sitter knows for sure…
tagline: She has him just where he wants her.
title: House Sitter
